channel.title: Swagu & Perk
channel.description: Don’t let their TV suits fool you. Former Dallas Cowboys defensive lineman Marcus Spears aka "Swagu" and NBA Champion Kendrick Perkins are longtime friends from South Texas and they’re ready to let loose. They’re going to go all in on the NFL, the NBA, culture and life and give you a whole lot of real.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Don’t let their TV suits fool you. Former Cowboys defensive lineman Marcus Spears aka "Swagu" and NBA Champ Kendrick Perkins are longtime friends from South Texas - they’re ready to let loose and give you a whole lot of real.

channel.content:encoded: Don’t let their TV suits fool you. Former Dallas Cowboys defensive lineman Marcus Spears aka "Swagu" and NBA Champion Kendrick Perkins are longtime friends from South Texas and they’re ready to let loose. They’re going to go all in on the NFL, the NBA, culture and life and give you a whole lot of real.

item.title: Clearing The Air
item.description: Swagu and Perk discuss Perk's injury and recovery, skinny Zion, Victor Wembanyama dominating against the G-League ignite and what that means for foreign players, and Perk questions who should be the QB in Dallas. All that and more! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: You Lost Your Damn Mind
item.description: Swagu and Perk discuss Perk getting injured in public and give picks for the Super Bowl, MVP, and a sleeper team. Plus, they discuss Tom Brady's training camp absence, Serena Williams' legacy, and how Russell Westbrook and Patrick Beverly will get along with the Lakers. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Staying Level
item.description: Swagu and Perk are back and they react to LeBron's contract extension, the latest chapter in the KD saga including the reports that Durant has given the Nets an ultimatum, if the Knicks should trade for Donovan Mitchell, and Lamar Jackson's current contract situation. Also the guys have a message regarding the murder of youth football coach Mike Hickman. Tune In! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Don't Be Running in Here Wrong
item.description: Swagu and Perk discuss the contract stipulations that are present in Zion Williamson and Kyler Murrary's contracts and what that means for their development as young players. Also, they discuss if Jaylen Brown should be offended that the Celtics put him in trade talks for Kevin Durant, and if they should be more willing to trade Jayson Tatum. Plus, Swagu has a bone to pick with the anonymous defensive coach who put out statements about Patrick Mahomes and Lamar Jackson. Tune In! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Houston
item.description: Swagu and Perk perform the pod live from The Rustic in Houston. They discuss Lamar Jackson's ranking and contract negotiations before being joined by their first ever guest to run through a defense of Russell Westbrook, what LeBron James is and isn't doing being the scenes, Kevin Durant's true value, and whether or not the NBA is headed for a lock out. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Cooked Wings
item.description: Swagu and Perk are back and they discuss the Kyrie Irving and Kevin Durant drama in Brooklyn, call out Draymond Green for being a false new media prophet, show love to Lamar Jackson for handling his business his way, and debate whether Charles Barkley was right for saying Kevin Durant wasn't a bus driver for the Warriors. All that and more! For tickets for the live show in Houston, Texas click here: bit.ly/swaguperk22 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: 2022 NBA Finals Game 1 Reaction
item.description: Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Kendrick Perkins courtside at the Chase Center immediately following Game 1 of the NBA Finals to react to a historic 4th quarter performance from Boston. The guys talk how the Celtics continue to bounce back in games this season and who needs to step up for the Warriors to respond. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Agenda Free
item.description: Swagu and Perk dive into the NBA being run by mostly international players, and how the faces of the league are changing amidst a heated MVP race between Nikola Jokic and Joel Embiid, also they discuss why the Phoenix Suns are winning so much despite injuries to young stars. Plus, they take a look at their favorite moments so far from the NCAA tournament. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: We Poddin'
item.description: Swagu and Perk discuss the slumping Warriors, who the next face of the NBA will be, Calvin Ridley's suspension, and why Brittney Griner (and other WNBA players) shouldn't have to supplement their income by playing overseas. Plus, how Swagu will celebrate his birthday and the debut of a new segment: Family Reunion. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Wisdom
item.description: Swagu and Perk have an open conversation about mental health in sports including their own struggles coming to terms with the end of their playing careers. Plus, the truth about leadership in a locker room and why quarterbacks and point guards aren't always the guy like the media wants you to believe. And are the Rams the team to beat in the NFL or do the Cowboys have something to say about it? Let's get it. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Introducing 'Swagu & Perk'
item.description: Don’t let their TV suits fool you. Former Dallas Cowboys defensive lineman Marcus Spears aka "Swagu" and NBA Champion Kendrick Perkins are longtime friends from South Texas and they’re ready to let loose. They’re going to go all in on the NFL, the NBA, culture and life and give you a whole lot of real. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
